distanceFieldCrispness - Variable in class com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph.Font
When Font.distanceField is Font.DistanceFieldType.SDF or Font.DistanceFieldType.MSDF, this determines how much the edges of the glyphs should be aliased sharply (higher values) or anti-aliased softly (lower values).

MSDF - Enum constant in enum class com.github.yellowstonegames.glyph.Font.DistanceFieldType
